column1: dialogues

Person 1: I'm stuck up here in Kings Lynn and really need to get into Cambridge. Can you look up a train for me please? Person 2: I can absolutely help you, but let's get some more information so we can book your ticket. What day and time would you like to leave?  Person 1: I would like to leave on Saturday after 17:00 Person 2: I have 7 different trains. The first one after 17:00 is train TR1499. It leaves at 17:11 and arrives at 17:58. Would that work for you?  Person 1: That works for me. What is the price for that? Person 2: 7.84 pounds for each ticket. Would you like me to book the train? Person 1: No, I'm not ready to book yet.  Thanks though.  Can you recommend a latin American restaurant? Person 2: I'm sorry there are no latin american restaurant Person 1: Are there any in the centre in the cheap price range? Person 2: I have fifteen places to dine in the centre, in a cheap range. What type of food would you like? Person 1: What about one that serves Asian oriental food? Person 2: Dojo noodle bar and J restaurant both are available, which would you prefer? Person 1: Dojo noodle bar, can you book me a table for 7 at 20:30 on Saturday? And I will need the reference number as well please. Person 2: Good news, your booking was succesful.  Your reference number is K7LWVQ5A. Can I do anything else for you? Person 1: Yes can you please book the train for me as well? Person 2:  Did you want the TR1499 booked that leaves on saturday at 17:11 and if so, for how many people? Person 1: Just the one ticket please. Person 2: Your seat is booked on TR1499 leaving Kings Lynn on Saturday at 18:11 for Cambridge, reference number is 0NGRLOZV. Is there anything more I can help with today? Person 1: That is everything I need, thank you. Person 2: Perfect. Enjoy your trip! Person 1: Thank you, that will be all!  Person 2: No problem, enjoy the rest of your day.

Person 1: I am looking for city centre north b and b Person 2: I have found the guesthouse you were wanting. Would you like me to book this for you? Person 1: Yes, please book it for 1 person and for 5 nights starting Friday. Person 2: Your booking was successful. The reference number is : BE1VD9EH. Person 1: Great, thank you so much. Person 2: You are very welcome!

Person 1: I am looking for a place to go in the centre of town. I'm really interested in a theatre.  Person 2: There are 4 theatres in the centre I recommend Mumford Theatre. Would you like the address? Person 1: Could I get their phone number? Person 2: Yes, their phone number is 08451962320. May I help you find anything else today? Person 1: I am also looking for a restaurant in the same area as Mumford Theatre.  Person 2: What type of cuisine and price point do you prefer? Person 1: do you have any in mind? It really doesn't matter, as long as its moderately priced and in the same general area as the mumford. Person 2: The varsity restaurant comes highly recommended and serves international food. Would you like me to book it? Person 1: yes book for 3 people at 19:30 on friday please Person 2: Your reference number is UZNF1KZ5 and your table will be held for 15 minutes. Is there anything else in which I can help you? Person 1: Great, I also need a taxi from the attraction to the restaurant and want to arrive by the reservation time. Person 2: I have booked your taxi. Be expecting a yellow Volvo. Please contact 07732601077 should you need to reach them.  Person 1: Thank you. That will be all.  Person 2: Ok! Have a great day!

Person 1: I need to find a place to stay in the centre of town.  Person 2: Do you have a price range?  Person 1: I'd like a cheap guest house with wifi. Person 2: Perfect. Alexander Bed and Breakfast is a cheap guesthouse in the center with free internet and parking. Can I book it for you? Person 1: Yes, that would be great. I will be there for three nights.  Person 2: How many people and from what day will you stay? Person 1: We arrive on Monday and stay for 3 nights, there are 7 of us. Person 2: Booking was successful.
Reference number is : DHS86PO0.  Can I help with anything else today? Person 1: I need to find a place to eat as well. Person 2: I would love to help you with that. Do you have anything specific in mind? Area? Price range? Person 1: I am looking for the same area and price range as the guesthouse -- centre and cheap. Person 2: dojo noodle bar would be perfect for you. Shall i book it ? Person 1: Actually I want a restaurant that serves food in the type of the americas Person 2: There are no cheap restaurants in the centre of town serving cheap food from the Americas. Wild you like to try a different area or cuisine?  Person 1: Sure, how about Portuguese?  Person 2: Nandos City Centre is a cheap place to eat and is in centre. Can I book it for you?  Person 1: Yes please. Also, I'd like to get a taxi and leave the hotel at 14:30. Could you get me the contact number and car type? Person 2: A black volkswagen is booked for you. The contact number is 07101354106. Anything else today, or will that be all? Person 1: Thanks for all of your help today you have been wonderful! Person 2: So glad I could be of assistance. Have a lovely day!

Person 1: I need help with a car accident dispute. Person 2: I'd be happy to help, I have the number for Parkside Police, is that near your location? Person 1: Can I have the address and postal to check? Person 2: The police station is Parkside, Cambridge, and the postcode is CB11JG. I can give you the telephone number, too. Person 1: Thank you goodbye Person 2: I'm glad we could help. Call us anytime you need something in Cambridge. Thank you!

Person 1: I was wanting help with a place to dine in Cambridge. Person 2: We have quite a few restaurants.  Do you have any preferences as far as locale, price range, or cuisine type? Person 1: Yes, we would like something in the centre, expensive chinese food would be great. Person 2: Great, I have four options for you. I would recommend HK Fusion. Person 1: That sounds great.  Can you book me a table for two at 3 p.m. on Sunday? Person 2: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is : CJSEN5QP Person 1: Perfect. Now, please find me a train leaving after 13:00 on Monday Person 2: Certainly. Where will you be traveling? Person 1: I would be leaving from Cambridge and going to Stevenage. Person 2: How about train TR1898 that leaves at 13:21? Person 1: Yes can  I please get the arrival time? Person 2: That train will arrive in Stevenage by 14:10. Will you be needing to purchase tickets? Person 1: Can you book it for me and get a reference number ? Person 2: Can you book it for me and get a reference number ?

Person 1: I'm looking for a train, but I don't want to have to get up too early. There's something that leaves after 8:15, right? Person 2: We have trains that go from early morning to late night, what is the route you will be taking and on what day? Person 1: I need to get to Stansted Airport on Monday. Person 2: I have the TR0797 departing at 08:40 and arrives at 09:08. Would you like me to book that for you? Person 1: book for 2 people and get me the reference number Person 2: Sure! The reference number for this booking is QA51IFDT and the total fee with be 20.2 GBP payable at the station. Can I assist you with anything else? Person 1: Thanks! Could you also help me find somewhere cheap to stay? Person 2: I have several options for you, did you want to stay in a particular area? Person 1: The area doesn't matter but I do need free wifi, please. Person 2: I have 10 places you could stay. Would you prefer a guesthouse or hotel? Person 1: A guesthouse will work out better and I need free parking too.  Person 2: alexander bed and breakfast is a very nice place and it fits your needs. Shall I book it ? Person 1: Sure.  The two of us want to stay for two nights starting Saturday. Person 2: Booking was successful.Reference number is : AVJ0CKBP. anything else? Person 1: Great that's all that I needed for today. Person 2: Alright, have a lovely day.  Person 1: Thank you, you too. Person 2: Than you very much!

Person 1: can i find the nearest police station Person 2: Hello. You can reach them at 01223358966, and they are in Parkside , postcode CB11JG. Is there anything else you need? Person 1: Can you give me the address? Person 2: The full address is Parkside, Cambridge. May I help you further? Person 1: No, that's good, thanks. Person 2: Great, I'm glad I could help. If you think of anything else you need feel free to ask.

Person 1: I am planning a trip in Cambridge Person 2: great, what would you like to know? Person 1: Are there any expensive restaurants in the south? Person 2: There are five expensive restaurants in the south. Would you like Mexican, Italian, Indian, or Chinese food? Person 1: italian food willl do Person 2: Frankie and bennys is available, would you like to book it? Person 1: Yea, please book me for 8 people on wednesday at 14:30.   Person 2: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.Reference number is : 1E5RVHJE.is there any other way i can help you? Person 1: I also need a train.  Person 2: What time and where are you departing and arriving?  Person 1: I would like it to leave after 10:00. Person 2: There are 2058 trains to pick from. I'll need to know your departure and destination locations Person 1: I'll be leaving Cambridge going to Ely, I'd like to leave after 10:00. Person 2: There is one that leaves at 11:50 arriving at 12:07. Would that work for you? Person 1: It does and could you please book it for 15 people and could you also give me the reference number? Person 2: Unfortunately, I am unable to book at this time. Person 1: Sorry I actually need that for 8 people on Thursday. Person 2: You are all set, the reference number is OY6PZ53J cost is 35.2 GBP payable at the station .  Any other questions today?
 Person 1: Nope you've been wonderful, thanks for all the help. Person 2: Thank you for the call, have a great trip.

Person 1: I'm looking for an upscale, expensive place to eat on the west side of town. Person 2: What type of food are you looking for? Person 1: I'm really in the mood for Jamaican food. Person 2: I'm sorry. There are no restaurants matching your criteria. Person 1: How about some indian food? Person 2: Okay now I have many options would you like a reservation at one of them? Person 1: I would. Can you book me a table for 1 on Tuesday at 11:45? Person 2: I'm sorry, all 5 restaurants meeting your criteria are booked at this time. Would you like me to try a different time slot? Person 1: Yes, can you try 10:45? Person 2: I was able to book you a table at Rice Boat on Tuesday at 10:45. The reference number is YTG3EOGF. Person 1: Thank you, that's all I need. Person 2: Great! Enjoy your meal! Goodbye!

Person 1: I'm looking for mid range spanish restaurants, can you help me? Person 2: I have a listing for la tasca in the centre area,can I book you a table there? Person 1: Sure. That sounds like a nice place. Go ahead and book that for me. Person 2: What day and time are you looking for? How many people will be in your party? Person 1: I need a table for 6 people Sunday night at 17:00. Person 2: I was unable to find a table at that time. Would you like to find another restaurant? Person 1: Can you find me something along the same price and in the same area please? Person 2: There are no other Spanish places in that area, another area or type perhaps? Person 1: Any in the same area, and price range please.  Person 2: The Copper Kettle is a British restaurant in the centre area with a moderate price range, would you like me to book that for you? Person 1: Okay, again for 6 people Sunday at 17:00. Person 2: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is : 840ZVK1R. Person 1: OK, that's all I need today, thank you! Person 2: You're welcome. Please call again.

Person 1: Can you help me find a museum? Person 2: Certainly! There are 23 great museums to visit. Are you looking for a specific area of town? Person 1: Not really. Which is your favorite? Person 2: My favorite is the Williams Art and Antiques. They are in the centre of town and offer free entrance. Would you like more information on it? Person 1: Yes adress and phone number please Person 2: The address is gwydir street, no. 5 dale's brewery, phone number is 01223311687. Anything else I can help you with? Person 1: I'm also looking for a train that goes to Cambridge on Thursday.  Person 2: Where are you leaving from? Is there a specific arrival or departure time that you need? Person 1: I am leaving from Broxbourne and should arrive by 21:30 Person 2: Is there a certain time you would like to leave? Person 1: no book  for 4 people and get the reference number Person 2: Booking was successful, the total fee is 94.4 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : D06EZBWG. Person 1: Thank you for your help. Person 2: You're welcome! Can I help you with anything else? Person 1: That is all I will need. Thank you.  Person 2: Have a good trip!

Person 1: i'm looking for a train leaving on thursday and arriving by 11:45 Person 2: There is a train leaving Thursday from Kings Lynn at 10:11, arriving at Cambridge at 10:58. Would you like me to pull up other listings? Person 1: Can you look up trains departing from Broxbourne instead? Person 2: I would recommend TR0393 which leaves Broxbourne at 5:32 and arrives in Cambridge at 6:32.  Person 1: Great!  Can you book 2 seats for me on that one? Person 2: Your train has been booked. Your total cost is 35.79, payable at the station. Your reference number is SQUCLNLA.  Can I help with anything else? Person 1: I need to book a room in a guesthouse that has free parking. Person 2: There are 21 guesthouses in town with free parking. Do you prefer a specific area of town or do you have a price range? Person 1: Not really but I do need a 4 star rating. Person 2: Do you have a price range in mind? And will you need wifi? Person 1: WiFi is not necessary, but I would like free parking. I'm looking for mid range pricing. Person 2: There are nine moderately priced guesthouses available. I suggest Home From Home, a 4-star guesthouse that comes with internet and parking. Would you like to book a room?  Person 1: Sounds great! I'll need to book a room for 2 people, for 2 nights starting Thursday.  Person 2: Excellent. You are all set, and your reference number is : 2GHO31DA.  Anything else I can assist you with today? Person 1: Thats everything thanks Person 2: I hope I could be of service today, enjoy your stay in Cambridge!

Person 1: I am looking for a train departing from stansted airport. Person 2: There are 133 trains departing from that location. What destination would you like to travel to? Person 1: I want to leave on monday after 21:45 and arrive in cambridge. Person 2: We have the TR7956 arriving in Cambridge on Monday at 22:52. Does that fit into your schedule? Person 1: Yes. Can you please book that for 5 people and provide my reference number for me? Person 2: Booking was successful, the total fee is 50.5 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : 6UVY4MBA.  Is there anything else I can help with today? Person 1: Can you tell me what types of entertainment are in the centre area? Person 2: There are no entertainment attractions located in the centre of town. Person 1: What about nightclubs? Person 2: Certainly, We have 5 nightclubs in the centre area, there is ballare, , kambar, soul tree nightclub, and the fez club.  Person 1: How about Soul Tree Nightclub? Could you send me the entrance fee and address? Person 2: The entrance fee is 4 pounds. The address is 1-6 corn exchange street. Can I help you with anything else? Person 1: What time does it open its doors? Person 2: I'm sorry, but I don't have that information in my database. Is there anything else I can assist you with today? Person 1: No, thank you. I am all set. Person 2: Great! Thank you for using Cambridge TownInfo! Goodbye!

Person 1: I need a place to stay in the north in the moderate price range if you could help me.  Person 2: Acorn Guesthouse offers moderate pricing in the North. Would you like me to book this for you? Person 1: Yes. Please book it.  Person 2: What day will you be arriving?  Person 1: I need the booking for 6 people, for 2 nights beginning on Thursday. Person 2: Okay, the booking was successful. Confirmation code is KNHD4Q79. Person 1: Also I need a train to Cambridge to depart Norwich at 8:30 on Tuesday. I need the train ID too. Person 2: Of course, train TR4134 will be leaving Norwich at 9:16, would you like me to book it for you? Person 1: No, I just need the train ID. Thanks. Person 2: Okay, the train ID is TR4134. Anything else today? Person 1: No that was all I needed. I appreciate your help. Person 2: I am glad to be of service! Bye for now!

Person 1: Hello! I'm needing a place to stay in the center of town. Parking is not important to me. What do you have? Person 2: I have a moderately priced hotel called Cityroomz available. Can I help you book your stay? Person 1: No thanks, but can I just get some information about Cityroomz? Person 2: Cityroomz is a moderatly priced 0-star hotel in the centre. They offer internet and parking and are located on station road. Person 1: I would like to book 5 nights on sunday for 5. Person 2: You're all set. Your Reference number is : T9VLKXV5. Person 1: Sounds great- thanks for your help! Person 2: Have a great visit!

Person 1: I wanted to travel to kings lynn. Do you have a train leaving on monday? Person 2: there are 19 trains available. What time of day would you like to travel? Person 1: I would like to arrive by 11:00 if possible please. Person 2: TR1854 Arrives at 10:58. TR1163 arrives at 09:58. Person 1: That would work can I get 7 tickets please? Person 2: Sure! Just to clarify, would you prefer the TR1854 train or the TR1163 train? Person 1: any will be fine with me. Person 2: TR1163, your booking was successful, the total fee is 68.6 GBP payable at the station. Reference number is : GFGRNXJT. Will there be anything else today? Person 1: I also need a place to stay that has free wifi and parking. Person 2: To help narrow it down, do you have an area or price range you prefer? Person 1: It should be in the moderate price range. Does that help? Person 2: In that case I recommend the acorn guest house. They have 4 stars and are in the north side of town with parking and internet for you Person 1: That sounds great!  Can you please book it for me starting on Thursday?  I will need the reference number please.   Person 2: The Reference number is : 0Q276EHV.

Person 1: I am looking to book a place to stay in Cambridge with free wifi with a moderate price range, can you help me with that? Person 2: Yes I have many options. Do you have preference for what part of town you stay in? Person 1: No preference. I'm looking for a 4 star and guesthouse type. Person 2: The acorn guest house is located in the north area and has free internet and parking. Would you like me to book this for you? Person 1: What is the address and phone number? Person 2: the phone number is 01223315702	and this is address. zipcode-cb12dp	124 tenison road. Person 1: I also need a train to Leicester on Monday.  Can you help? Person 2: What is your departure site and time? Person 1: The train should depart from cambridge and should leave after 12:45. Person 2: Train TR6799 leaves Cambridge at 13:21 and arrives in Leicester at 15:06, and is 37.80 pounds.  Would you like me to book this for you? Person 1: Yes, for 5 tickets please.  Person 2: I have booked 5 tickets for you, your reference number is BEDWHGFA. Is there anything else I can do for you today? Person 1: No that's all, thanks!  Person 2: Thank You for using our service, have we met all of your needs? Person 1: Yes, thank you so much for all of your help. Have a nice day.  Person 2: You're very welcome, thank you. You have a nice day as well.  Person 1: Alright, if that's everything I'm going to close the dialogue, thanks again! Person 2: And, again, you are welcome.

Person 1: I need a italian restaurant in the centre.  Person 2: what about pizza express? it's getting great reviews. Person 1: Is it an expensive restaurant? Person 2: No, Pizza Express is moderately priced. But I could find a cheaper option if you would like? Person 1: I would prefer an expensive price range and need a reservation for 1 at 13:30 on Monday. Person 2: I am sorry but there are no Italian restaurants in the expensive range in the centre.  Would you like to try another area or type of food?  Person 1: What would you suggest? Person 2: There are two moderately priced italian restaurants in centre or would you like a different type of food? Person 1: so, nothing that is expensive? Person 2: no expensive with those specifications Person 1: Okay, let's just go with a moderately priced one. I need a table on Monday at 13:30 for one person.  Person 2: Would you like to try pizza express? Person 1: okay why not. I need a table for 1 at 13:30 on monday. And I need the reference number too please Person 2: Okay. Your booking was successful! The reference number is YBCVLUXU. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.  Person 1: Thanks, what places to go are available in that same area? Person 2: What kind of attraction are you looking for? Person 1: Anything will do. Person 2: How about holy trinity church.  The architecture there is quite impressive. Person 1: Sounds interesting.  What is the postcode? Person 2: The postcode is cb23nz. Can I help you with any other information? Person 1: I do not need more information. Person 2: Great. If you need help in the future, please contact us.

Person 1: I am looking for a zero star hotel in Cambridge. Person 2: Cityroomz is a 0 star hotel available. Person 1: Is it a mid-budget hotel? I'm also looking for a hotel that's located near the centre. Person 2: Cityroomz is located in the centre and is moderately priced. It is the only hotel to your specifications. Shall I book you a reservation? Person 1: Does it have internet?  Person 2: Yes, it does!  Person 1: What is the address? Person 2: The address of this Cityroomz is Sleeperz Hotel, Station road. Postcode cb12tz. Would you like help booking a stay? Person 1: No, thanks. I will need a train to Bishops stortford, though. Person 2: Sure! Which day and time would you like to depart or arrive by? Person 1: I would like to depart on Friday from Cambridge. I'd like to arrive at Bishops Stratford by 12:30. Can you tell me a departure time please. Person 2: There are four trains that fir your criteria. The departure times are 05:29, 07:29, 09:29 and 11:29. Would you like me to book for you? Person 1: Yes,please book for 07:29. Person 2: I will be happy to book you on train TR6809 leaving at 7:29 and arriving at 8:07. How many tickets would you like for this train? Person 1: Actually hold off on that part, I'm not sure how many tickets I need yet. Person 2: Okay I have not booked a train yet, is there something else you'd like me to look up for you? Person 1: No that was all I needed for today. Thanks! Person 2: Great! Thanks for allowing me to assist you! Goodbye!

Person 1: I need to book a taxi from Saint Johns Chop House to Williams Art and Antiques please. Person 2: Not a problem, I will need your preferred pick up and arrival times in order to book your cab. Person 1: The taxi should leave by 3:15. Person 2: I have booked a taxi for you! The car is a yellow honda. The contact number is 07799036655. Is there anything else you need today? Person 1: I'm sorry, could you make sure the taxi is actually leaving after 3:15?  I made an error earlier. Person 2: No problem, a blue lexus will pick you up at 3:20. The contact number is 07581540721. Will there be anything else? Person 1: That should be perfect! Person 2: It was a pleasure to help you. Person 1: Thank you so much! Person 2: Thank you let me know if you need anything else.

Person 1: I am looking for architectural spots to visit on my trip to Cambridge.  On the east side. Person 2: Well, unfortunately there are architectural attractions located in the east. Would you like to try a different area? Person 1: No, that's okay. Are there any Museums in the East instead? Person 2: I can recommend four different museums in the east area. How about Cambridge artworks? It is popular. Person 1: That sounds interesting.  What is the entrance fee for this museum? Person 2: The cambridge artworks is a free museum. Can I help you with anything else today? Person 1: Can you give me their phone number and postcode, please? Person 2: Absolutely. Their phone number is 01223902168 and they are in postcode cb13ef. Person 1: Excellent. I'm also looking for a train as well. Person 2: Certainly. Do you have a destination in mind? Person 1: Yes, I am looking to depart from London Kings Cross that should arrive in Cambridge by 15:00 and I need it for 3 people and will need the reference number. Person 2: I need to narrow the search down. What day will you be traveling? Person 1: On Monday please. Person 2: I was able to book you on TR3194 which leaves london kings cross at 13:17 and arrives Cambridge at 14:08. Reference R6KWX99C. Can I help with anything else? Person 1: Nope, that's everything. Thank you! Person 2: You're welcome, have a great day!

Person 1: I need to take a train from cambridge on saturday. Person 2: There are 202 trains that fit that criteria, whats your destination? Person 1: I am going to stansted airport on saturday and need the train to leave anytime after 15:30 please Person 2: I have train ID 2001 leaving at  16:40 arriving Stansted Airport at 17:08.  Would you like me to confirm this for you. Person 1: Before I book this, what is the price? Person 2: The price is 8.08 pounds. Would you like me to book it? Person 1: No I'm not ready to book a spot yet. I do need to find a place to eat in the west though. Person 2: There are 14 restaurants in the west. Is there a particular cuisine you are looking for? Person 1: I would like an indian restaurant.  Person 2: The tandoori palace has Indian cuisine. Would you like me to book a table? Person 1: Yes I'd love one, please. Just me, and I'd like to eat at 10:15 on the same day. Person 2: I apologize, the booking for that time slot was unsuccessful. Would you like to book for another day or time? Person 1: How about 9:15? Person 2: They are not open that early, can I try another time? Person 1: Sure. Are they open at 11:15?  Person 2: I'm sorry, that time didn't work either, would you like to try something else? Person 1: Sure. Please try 10:15 on the same day. I would like the reference number, please.  Person 2: I'm sorry, neither 11:15 nor 10:15 are available at Tandoori Palace. Would you like to try a different restaurant, maybe Meghna, an Indian place with a moderate price range? Person 1: Yes, please book Meghna for 10:15, same day. Person 2: Unfortunately, there are no bookings available for that time. Would you like to try a different time or day? Person 1: I would really like indian food on saturday in the west area. If you can book it for 1 person at 10:15 or 9:15 I don't care which place. Person 2: I booked India House for 1 at 9:15 on Saturday, reference number XWR84US7. The restaurant is at 31 Newnham Road. Is this satisfactory? Person 1: Yes, I am relieved. I have no more questions. Thank you for your persistence. Good bye. Person 2: You're welcome. I am sorry it took so long. Have a nice day.

Person 1: I'm looking for colleges to visit in the centre of town.  Person 2: There are 13 colleges in the centre.  King's College and Saint Catharine's College are on the same street and both have free admission.   Person 1: Can you provide the phone number and post code to the attraction? Person 2: King's College is cb21st and their number is 01223331100. Saint Catharine's is cb21rl and their number is 01223338300.  Person 1: What is the entrance fee? Person 2: Both are free. Is there anything else you'd like help with? Person 1: Yes, actually. I could use some help finding a train to take me from Cambridge heading to Bishops Stortford.  Person 2: What day and departure time do you prefer? Person 1: I want to leave on Saturday at any time after 21:15.  Person 2: How many ticket will you need? Person 1: I would just like to know the travel time of one or more of the trains.  Person 2: They are both 38 minute trips Person 1: Thanks. That's all the information I needed today. I appreciate your help. Person 2: You're welcome. Enjoy your stay in Cambridge. Good bye!

Person 1: I am looking for an attraction called Cambridge Artworks. Person 2: Cambridge Artworks is a museum in the east area of town. It is located at 5 greens road, postcode cb13ef. Their phone is 01223902168, and entrance is free. Person 1: Thank you so much. Person 2: You're welcome and thank you! Have a great day. Person 1: Could you help me find a train going to Cambridge on Tuesday? Person 2: That's no problem. We have 202 results for that, though. Where are you leaving from? Person 1: I am leaving from kings lynn. But I must be in cambridge no later than 9:30. Person 2: We have the TR8782 arriving in cambridge at 08:58. Does that work? Person 1: That is good, how much does it cost? Person 2: Each ticket is 23.60 GBP. Would you like to book a ticket? Person 1: Actually, can you provide me with the travel time for that train? Person 2: The travel time is 51 minutes for that Person 1: Thanks, that's all I need today. You've been a great help! Person 2: You're welcome. Have a great day!

Person 1: Hi, I am planning a trip to Cambridge soon and could use some help with a train. Person 2: Sure, I can help you with that. Where are you departing from? Person 1: I will be departing from Ely. Person 2: I have 70 trains departing from Ely to Cambridge, what day are you planning to travel on? Person 1: Leaving on Monday after 9:15. I would like a booking for 3 people and the reference number as well. Person 2: There is a 9:35 that arrives at 9:52.  How does that sound?  Person 1: That sounds great! I need to book that for three people.  Person 2: Your reference number for TR2987 is 8QYPSGFH.  Is there anything else I can help you with? Person 1: Could you also look up the hotel called Hobsons House? Person 2: Yes, the Hobsons House is a guesthouse in the west area. It's moderate in price with three stars. Would you like to make a booking?

Person 1: I'm looking for a restaurant in cambridge that serves italian. I would like it to be in the south.  Person 2: There are two italian places. Pizza Hut and Frankie and Bennys. Would you like to make a reservation at one of them? Person 1: Maybe.  I need a place that serves expensive food.  Does either place fit the bill? Person 2: Yes, Frankie and Benny's is expensive. Person 1: I would like to book a table for 6 people at 19:00 on Monday. I need the reference number for the booking as well. Preferably 2 stars?  Person 2: Your booking was successful and your reference number is X1MZQY3X. Person 1: If you could assist me with finding a hotel, I'd appreciate it.  I really need a hotel that includes free wifi and free parking. Person 2: Well, we've got the alexander bed and breakfast in the same area that has both parking and wifi. Your reference number is 6F95T0XQ. Person 1: Thank you that is all I needed.  Person 2: Have a great time.

Person 1: I'm trying to take a train from bishops stortford to cambridge Person 2: Okay great, there are plenty of options for you. Did you have a certain day and time in mind for departure? Person 1: I want to leave on monday after 18:30. Person 2: There is a train that leaves at 19:29, would you like to book it? Person 1: What is the arrival time? I also need the train ID and price. Person 2: Your arrival time is 20:07 on train TR5806. Total price is 10.10 pounds. Would you like me to book a ticket? Person 1: No that won't be necessary. I would like to find a place to stay though, and I'll need free parking.  Person 2: Indeed, we have many options with free parking. Would you prefer a guesthouse or a hotel? Person 1: Well, I need a place in the south with a 4-star rating, but either hotel or guesthouse is OK. Person 2: aylesbray lodge guest house is in the moderate price range and rosa's bed and breakfast is in the cheap price range.  Which do you prefer? Person 1: Can you send me the hotel type and postcode and whether they have internet? Person 2: Both have internet and are guesthouses. Aylesbray lodge's postcode is cb17sr. Rosa's postcode is cb22ha.  Person 1: Great, thanks! That's all I needed.  Person 2: You're welcome.  Please let us know if you need any more assistance. Person 1: Thank you, you've been very helpful.  Person 2: You're welcome. Have a good day.

Person 1: I am looking for an expensive guesthouse to stay in during my trip to Cambridge. Person 2: Unfortunately there is nothing that matches your criteria. Would you like to try a hotel or different price range instead? Person 1: Are you sure there are no expensive guesthouses in the whole town? Person 2: Yes I am certain.  Would you like to try another price range? Person 1: How about the moderate price range? Person 2: Certainly, there are 15 moderately priced guesthouses. Do you require internet or parking?  Person 1: Free parking would be great please. Person 2: 12 of those places offer free parking, any other preferences? Person 1: Is there a guesthouse that Is close to the South ?  Person 2: There are 2. One is 4 stars and the other is 3.  Do you have a preference? Person 1: Could I have the 4 star please Person 2: I would recommend alyesbray lodge guest house. Would you like me to book that for you? Person 1: I would rather stay at a hotel if that's okay. Person 2: The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel is an expensive 4 star hotel in the west with free parking.  Does that fit your needs? Person 1: Actually, can you give me the postcode for the alysebray lodge guest house? Person 2: Sure. Their postcode is cb17sr. Anything else I can assist you with?  Person 1: Yes I am looking for someplace to tour in town in the south involving architecture. Person 2: Unfortunately, we don't have any architecture attractions in southern Cambridge. Would you like me to search other areas of Cambridge for architectural attractions? Person 1: Okay, I'd like to find an entertainment place in the south. Person 2: I have Nusha and Tenpin that are entertainment venues in the south. Which one interests you?  Person 1: I will pick option two! Thank you very much for the help and have a great day! Person 2: Was that all you needed today? Person 1: Actually, can you give me the address, postcode, and phone number of Tenpin? Person 2: Sure, the address is cambridge leisure park, clifton way, number is 08715501010, and their postcode is cb17dy. Is there anthing else you need? Person 1: No that's everything, thanks. Goodnight! Person 2: Okay fantastic, have a good one.

I'd like to arrive at the restaurant in time for my reservation. Person 2: Contact number 07404031593. You are in a Red Skoda.  Person 1: Thank you so much that was all I needed.  Person 2: Alright, hope you enjoy the rest of your day.
